name: Swatch (squishyfrogs)
description:
More of a clunky prototype/tech demo than a fleshed out game... I had less time to work on it than I would have liked, but oh well. Looking forward to fixing this up in the future! 

Goal: Navigate 8 floors of Maze by utilizing your paint brush to create paths. The slime can travel through walls by standing on tiles of the same color as it.

Controls:
Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys
Paint Tile: Left Mouse button
Erase Tile: Right Mouse button (must have matching paint color equipped)
